import React from "react" import axios from "axios" const API = "http://localhost/contact/index.php" class Quote extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name: "", email: "", message: "", mailSent: false, error: null, } } handleBack = () => { this.props.setInputStage("2") } handleFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Sent") axios({ method: 'post', url: `${API}`, headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json' }, data: this.state }) .then(result => { this.setState({ mailSent: result.data.sent }) }) .catch(error => this.setState({ error: error.message })); }; render() { return (
this.handleBack()}> Back
{this.props.additionalprod.name}
{this.props.additionalprod2}
{this.props.colour}
this.setState({ name: e.target.value }) } />
this.setState({ email: e.target.value }) } required />
